page.title: 04Education 2
page.content: In{Ysgol Gymraeg Ty Derwen}all subjects are taught through the medium of{Welsh,}except English of course. A typical day's time table would be:- 1.{Mathematics,}done in groups or somtimes as a class.2."Cynllun y porth"(project work) including {History, Science, Geogrophy}and other things.3.P.E.rounders,basketball.etc. 4. English.taught by Miss Mort and Mr Evans.5.Television/ Radio. We video record most programmes including "Hyn o fyd "an Enviromental Studies programme and "Hwnt ac yma" a{Science programme. We also use the computer during the day, using Welsh language programmes. When the pupils reach the age of eleven they then travelto Llanharri Welsh medium Comprehensive School.
